hooks.command: echo '## Git Context' && echo "**Branch:** $(git branch --show-current)" && echo '**Recent commits:**' && echo '```text' && git log --oneline -5 --decorate && echo '```' && echo '**Working tree:**' && echo '```text' && git status --short && echo '```'

echo '## Git Context (post-compaction)' && echo "**Branch:** $(git branch --show-current)" && echo '**Recent commits:**' && echo '```text' && git log --oneline -5 --decorate && echo '```' && echo '**Working tree:**' && echo '```text' && git status --short && echo '```' && echo '**Diff from main:**' && echo '```text' && git diff --stat origin/main...HEAD 2>/dev/null && echo '```'
